keyMoments.title: Usopp's Departure from the Crew
keyMoments.description: After losing the duel to Luffy, Usopp officially parts ways with the Straw Hat Pirates, reducing their active membership.
keyMoments.significance: The first time a member leaves the Straw Hat Pirates, creating a major crisis within the crew.

keyMoments.title: The Crew Leaves the Going Merry
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hat Pirates gather their belongings and permanently depart from their first ship, the Going Merry, in an emotionally devastating scene.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the end of an era for the crew, losing both a crew member and their beloved ship in the same episode.

keyMoments.title: Luffy's Growth as Captain
keyMoments.description: Luffy demonstrates his maturity as captain by bearing the emotional weight of his difficult decisions, with Zoro affirming this burden.
keyMoments.significance: A pivotal moment in the crew's development, establishing clear hierarchy and the responsibilities of leadership.

membershipChanges.reason: Lost duel to Luffy over the Going Merry and chose to leave the crew
membershipChanges.circumstances: After disagreeing with Luffy's decision to replace the Going Merry, Usopp challenged him to a duel and lost, resulting in his departure from the crew.
